text: Benedetta Pilato (born 28 January 2005) is an Italian swimmer. She competed in the women's 50 metre breaststroke at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships, winning the silver medal, at the age of 14. ==References== Category:2005 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female swimmers Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Italian female breaststroke swimmers Category:World Aquatics Championships medalists in swimming
title: Benedetta Pilato
